body.name: B. toys- Happy Cruisers- 6 Mini Vehicles – Sports, Police, Pickup, Roadster, Taxi, 4x4 – Classic Toys for Toddlers, Kids – 1 Year +

features: Toy Cars: A set of 6 colorful mini vehicles for tons of indoor and outdoor fun!
Includes: This play set comes with a sports car, police car, pickup truck, roadster, taxi, and a 4x4.
Developmental Play: Playing with these mini vehicles develops fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination.
Kid-Friendly: Each toy car complies with regulatory phthalates and BPA requirements.
Age: The Happy Cruisers Mini Vehicles are recommended for toddlers 1 year +
body.description: Zoom, vroom, roll, and ride at home or outside with the Happy Cruisers Mini Vehicles from B. toys! This play set comes with 6 colorful cars – a sky-blue sports car, blue police car, teal pickup truck, red roadster, yellow taxi, and a light green 4x4. All of these toy cars are easy to hold, and can improve a mini driver’s fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination. Not to mention, the vibrant colors and realistic details are sure to encourage tons of pretend play fun. So hop into the driver’s seat, turn on your imagination’s engine, and play the days away! Recommended for toddlers 12 months and over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These car toys were such a great value! They are a very durable material and the colors are very vibrant! They came in a nice gift able sleeve, and it was absolutely perfect for my angel tree kid that wanted cars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These cars are sturdy and brightly colored. They are also larger than expected, but my one year old can pick them up and play with them. There are six to a container and I give him one at a time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are perfect for Operation Christmas Child boxes for the 2-4 year old boys. Sturdy and so cute!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great addition to sensory bins
reviews.reviewText: Very simple, but cute and well made vehicle set. These are not fancy…no moving doors or lights…but durable and fun. Love that the set comes with a variety of color schemes and vehicle types. Our toddler is a huge fan! We have been using them daily in our sensory bins, with water, sand, play mud, play dough, etc. Our son especially loves the pickup truck as the bed can carry around his small animal figurines.-Bright inviting colors-Durable, can handle rough toddler play-Nice little details on the vehicle interiors. Each vehicle is a little different.-Very affordable set.-Roll well and easily-Good size for toddlers to easily maneuver.-Set includes a variety of vehicle types.-Perfect addition to sensory bins and for promoting imaginative play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are the best little cars for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: My toddler plays with these non stop. She loves having her own cars, so she can play with her older brother. They are large enough that I don’t have to worry about her swallowing anything and small enough that they are easy for her to grip and hold on to. They are made of a light plastic so they aren’t heavy at all. I definitely recommend purchasing for your little one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, high quality cars
reviews.reviewText: These cars are adorable and were instantly loved by a 1-year-old. They grabbed his attention right away and he played with them for a long time.The cars are lightweight but also strong. The plastic has held up well to being dropped and tossed. They’re the perfect size for a long toddler who is still developing grip and coordination. Overall, super happy with these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good kids toy
reviews.reviewText: Bought them for a gift and the kiddos love playing with it and it not to small for the little ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy than it looks!!!! 4.5/5.0 stars
reviews.reviewText: These cars are made of recyclable material (No.5 plastic), which I believe is curb recyclable. No metal pieces are used to build the cars. While these cars don't have a very smooth finish like B toys' other toys, they are very sturdy!The plastic used to make the cars is hard plastic. I tried to push the roof of the blue car because I was worried that our 2-year-old might crush it. Surprisingly, the plastic is much sturdier than it looks. As I applied more force, it still did not bend (see the picture I uploaded, my finger tip is turning white because I am pushing it hardly...), so I am not worried about its sturdiness.Pros:1.Larger than I thought2.Sturdier than I expected3.Great value (about $1.2 per car)4.Environmentally friendly plastic (not made with mixed materials such as metal + plastic, etc.)Cons:Not very shiny and doesn't look very fancy.I have to say these little cars are better than I thought, and they are a great value. I am giving it 4.5/5.0 starts, rounds up to 5 star.
